derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French deien, from late Latin decanus 'chief of a group of ten', from decem 'ten'. Comparedoyen

encyclopedia.content: 中文拼写：迪安 名字含义：河谷，首席官员，教会官方 名字来源：拉丁语 Dizzy Dean 迪齐·迪安： （1911～1974)，美国棒球名投手。2. James Dean 詹姆斯·迪安： （1931～1955)，美国演员，死于车祸前只主演过《无因的反叛》等3部影片，却因其中塑造忧郁叛逆的角色而出名。

entry.def: A dean is an important official at a university or college.

example.ex: She was Dean of the Science faculty at Sophia University.
example.tran: 她是上智大学科学院的院长。

entry.def: A dean is a priest who is the main administrator of a large church.

example.ex: ...Alan Webster, former Dean of St Paul's.
example.tran: 艾伦·韦伯斯特，圣保罗大教堂前教长

entry.def: The dean of a group is the most important member of that group.

example.ex: ...Aaron Copland, who was known as the dean of American composers.
example.tran: 阿隆·科普兰，美国最资深的作曲家

means.word_mean: 1. an administrator in charge of a division of a university or college
2. a man who is the senior member of a group;

sentences.sentence: "he is the dean of foreign correspondents"

means.word_mean: 3. (Roman Catholic Church) the head of the College of Cardinals
